name: io.github.frndchagas/expo-android
title: Expo Android MCP
description: MCP server for Android emulator automation via ADB.

environmentVariables.name: ADB_SERIAL
environmentVariables.description: Device serial to target (optional, auto-detects if only one device is connected).

environmentVariables.name: ADB_TIMEOUT_MS
environmentVariables.description: Timeout for adb commands in milliseconds.

environmentVariables.name: ADB_MAX_BUFFER_MB
environmentVariables.description: Max buffer size for adb output in MB.

environmentVariables.name: PORT
environmentVariables.description: HTTP port when MCP_TRANSPORT is http or both.
